column4: I'm downloading the iso now. It will be on my box in 10 minutes.
Should the problem still be there, then can I report the problem to Ubuntu, even though it is a kernel problem?
Well, I am a developer, but not when it comes to Linux :)
5;1 root@sxark:/# dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/hda6
Here goes.
(And I really, really hope it leaves my raid arrays alone this time.)
Oh, user.
Xfree
youre not supposed to read the license of cdrecord while burning :)
Then why does it let me wait 9 whole seconds?
cdrecordis crap, but there's nothing better yet
I agree. This is one of those things where some OSS goes wrong.
There's one thing which has been used for years. Even though many agree that it sucks, it takes balls to start a new project that isn't a fork.
id say in burnproof.....
That too, obviously :)
what a line.... wow
I have a local proxy. The line itself isn't bad either, though.
squid serves me well and transparently.
Raid was preserved this time :) Thanks for crossing your fingers
great :)
night
